parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the API group.

parameters.name: Method
parameters.description: The request HTTP method of the API.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries returned per page.
Default value:10.

parameters.name: Path
parameters.description: The request path of the API.

parameters.name: PluginId
parameters.description: The ID of the gateway plug-in.
